title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7404.1 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7404.1 - Policy

State Regulations

The Office of Children and Family Services (OCFS) shall
operate each secure facility in a manner that provides for adequate supervision
of residents and for a safe and secure environment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7404.1

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
